content.text: Any component uninsulated live part shall be so secured  to the base or mounting surface, or otherwise insulated  that the part does not turn or shift in position resulting  in a reduction of creepage distances, clearances and  distances below the minimum required values of 28 of  IS 17017 (Part 2/Sec 1).
